CustomField.formula: IF(Owner:User.UserRole.Name = 'CITCV Sales Consultant', 'Assigned',IF(Owner:User.UserRole.Name = 'CITPC Sales Consultant', 'Assigned',IF(Owner:User.UserRole.Name = 'KIACV Sales Consultant', 'Assigned',IF(Owner:User.UserRole.Name = 'KIAPC Sales Consultant', 'Assigned','Unassigned'))))
CustomField.label: Lead Assigned Status
